snippet: The reigning Olympic champion Steven Holcomb remained perfect on the season, driving USA-1 to victory in a World Cup four-man race.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; USA-1 bobsled team, led by reigning Olympic champion Steven Holcomb, takes first place in World Cup four-man race in Lake Placid, NY; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The reigning Olympic champion Steven Holcomb remained perfect on the season, driving USA-1 to victory in a World Cup four-man race.

headline.main: U.S. Bobsledder Stays Perfect in World Cup
headline.print_headline: U.S. Bobsledder Stays Perfect in World Cup
